mapper.select:
SELECT s.share_id shareId, s.title, s.share_content shareContent, s.state, s.view, s.refuse_reason refuseReason, a.association_id associationId, a.association_name associationName, u.user_id userId, u.name FROM `share` s INNER JOIN association a ON s.association_id = a.association_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND s.is_del = 0
AND s.share_id = #{shareId}
mapper.sql: share_id, title, state, view, refuse_reason, association_id, user_id, is_del
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from share
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from share
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into share
share_id,
title,
state,
view,
refuse_reason,
association_id,
user_id,
is_del,
share_content,

mapper.update:
update share
share_id = #{record.shareId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view = #{record.view,jdbcType=INTEGER},
refuse_reason = #{record.refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
association_id = #{record.associationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
share_content = #{record.shareContent,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},

update share set share_id = #{record.shareId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view = #{record.view,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refuse_reason = #{record.refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, association_id = #{record.associationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_content = #{record.shareContent,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}
